hr.fer.zemris.java.fractals

Class Newton

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.fractals.Newton

  • public class Newton
extends java.lang.Object
    This program renders fractals derived from Newton-Raphson iteration and uses FractalViewer for visualization.
    Program will read from standard input roots of the polynomial on which the calculation will be based.
    Author:
    Dan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Newton.CalculationJob
      This class calculates a part of the fractal image.
      static class  Newton.Complex
      This class represents an immutable complex number and offers basic operations over complex numbers.
      static class  Newton.ComplexPolynomial
      This class represents an immutable model of coefficient-based complex polynomial.
      static class  Newton.ComplexRootedPolynomial
      This class represents an immutable model of root-based complex polynomial.
      static class  Newton.IFractalProducerImpl
      Implementation of IFractalProducer that renders fractals based on Newton-Raphson iteration.

      • parse

        public static Newton.Complex parse(java.lang.String s)
        Parses the given string into a complex number from the form a+ib or a-ib.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Newton.Complex parsed from the given String
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the given String cannot be parsed
